text: Donald Thomas Valentine (June 26, 1932 â€“ October 25, 2019) was an American venture capitalist. His companies focused on technology companies in the United States. He was called the "grandfather of Silicon Valley venture capital". Valentine died on October 25, 2019 in Woodside, California at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Don Valentine
